custom_css: .card__content {display: grid; grid-template-rows: minmax(0, 1fr) max-content minmax(0, 1fr); padding: 1rem; width: 60%; flex-grow: 1;}

@media only screen and (max-width: 600px) {.card__inner {width: 70%; margin: 0px auto; } .card__content {display: grid; grid-template-rows: minmax(0, 1fr) max-content minmax(0, 1fr); padding: 1rem; width: 100%; flex-grow: 1;}}
